attributes.action: excuse prison officers from the wearing of ties as part of their uniform,as the same as their female colleagues who do not wear ties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Male prison officers have to wear a tie as part of their uniform, female officers do not wear ties,the prime minister would be able to save on public funds if he were to allow equality on this issue,it will also allow a barrier to be removed when dealing with prisoners as ties maybe interprited as an intimitory part of the prison officers uniform as was prison officers headgear which was made obsolete a number of years ago.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
